alert.note: Alert for Adams; Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 12 at 8:10AM MDT until May 12 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Denver has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Colorado... South Platte River at Henderson affecting Weld and Adams Counties. For the South Platte River...including Henderson...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...South Platte River at Henderson. * WHEN...From this morning to late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, There is minor over bank flow into low lying areas along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM MDT Friday the stage was 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall below advisory level late this afternoon. - Action stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. this afternoon at 500 PM MDT.
